name: Photocrash
description:
After many years of being used for art and level design, the Paintbrush is finally separate from the mouse cursor. No more traveling to this and that, and no more releasing colored pixels on command. The Paintbrush can finally do what it wants to do, but there will be people who won't like that.

Gameplay

Jump and hop all around, and collect keys to unlock locks.* Get through the challenges of the artist's projects with 3 tools to collect. Deal with deleted files, and eventually, the Artist himself.

* The mechanic isn't that important, so I guess the game barely follows the theme of the jam.  

Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys- Move

Space bar- Jump

1, 2, or 3- Equip tools

Left mouse button- Use tool

Escape- Pause
